events.message: I received the wrong size jacket and I want to return it for a full refund since it doesn't fit at all.
System identified the issue as a refund request due to incorrect size received by customer.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect jacket size.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that the jacket size was not right. I’m here to help you with your return and refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in original packaging for the return?
My order number is 987654321 and yes, the jacket is still unused and in the original packaging ready for return.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket, and once received, we will issue a full refund to your original payment method.
That sounds perfect, thank you for your quick help and for providing the return label so promptly.
We confirmed the return package was delivered today, and the refund has now been processed to your account.
Just checking in to make sure you received the refund and everything was handled to your satisfaction.
Yes, the refund arrived today. Very happy with the customer service. Thanks again!
Closing the case as the refund has been successfully completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
